edu.cs495.game.objects.equipment

Class AbstractItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.game.AbstractGameObject
      • edu.cs495.game.objects.equipment.AbstractItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractArmor

    public abstract class AbstractItem
extends AbstractGameObject
    An item that a player have in their inventory and drop on the ground
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau
